raw_markdown="[![Clear Gene with link to Home page](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea091ebc6ce1045a0aa723/63ea091fbc6ce1510c0aa741_ClearGene%20logo.png)](https://cleargene.com/<#>)[Residual Disease](https://cleargene.com/<#residual-desease>)[Covid-19](https://cleargene.com/<#covid-19>)[About Us](https://cleargene.com/<#about-us>)[Culture](https://cleargene.com/<#culture>)[Location](https://cleargene.com/<#location>)[Jobs](https://cleargene.com/</jobs>)[Privacy](https://cleargene.com/</privacy-policy>)
# RNA Diagnostics
## From Cancer to Covid
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea091ebc6ce1045a0aa723/63ea091fbc6ce13fc40aa74a_Microscope.webp)
## Residual Disease
Outside of our pandemic work, we use genomics and machine learning to detect residual solid tumor.
Residual disease is cancer that remains after a treatment.
Patients with liquid tumors have benefited from a series of technical revolutions in residual disease detection.
But patients with solid tumors like breast cancer have been left behind. Until now.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea091ebc6ce1045a0aa723/63ea091fbc6ce111c40aa751_Pattern%2001.svg)
## Products to Support Covid-19 Labs
Clear Gene helps clinical labs process more samples, for less cost, using your existing equipment.
MICA Software™ uses an advanced signal-processing algorithm to make more reliable Ct calls. If your lab uses multiple tests and instruments, you can replace multiple interpretive software programs with one interface.
MICA Test Kits are rapid, sensitive, drop-in replacements for PCR.
MICA–Direct™ Kits provide reagents to replace tedious RNA isolations with 5-minute extractions that are compatible with PCR and isothermal tests like MICA.
![ClearGene product medicine packaging](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea091ebc6ce1045a0aa723/63ea091fbc6ce19af30aa745_Clear%20Gene%20box.webp)
[Learn more](https://cleargene.com/<http:/micatest.com>)
## About Us
We're a group of careful scientists, quietly working behind the scenes to arm those labs on the front lines of patient care.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea091ebc6ce1045a0aa723/63ea091fbc6ce187160aa749_Scientist.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea091ebc6ce1045a0aa723/63ea091fbc6ce16ab20aa75c_Scientist%20tablet.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea091ebc6ce1045a0aa723/63ea091fbc6ce19bcd0aa754_Scirntist%20mobile.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea091ebc6ce1045a0aa723/63ea091fbc6ce13ee50aa752_Micro.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea091ebc6ce1045a0aa723/63ea091fbc6ce1e5190aa747_Formula.webp)
## Culture of Innovation
Life-changing advances require an environment that nurtures unorthodox ideas while simultaneously rewarding methodical product development.
We strive to work along both ends of the innovation spectrum.
## Location
## Supported by
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea091ebc6ce1045a0aa723/63ea091fbc6ce198710aa74b_YC.svg)

Privacy Preference Center
When you visit websites, they may store or retrieve data in your browser. This storage is often necessary for the basic functionality of the website. The storage may be used for marketing, analytics, and personalization of the site, such as storing your preferences. Privacy is important to us, so you have the option of disabling certain types of storage that may not be necessary for the basic functioning of the website. Blocking categories may impact your experience on the website. View Our [Cookie Policy](https://cleargene.com/</cookie-policy>).
[Accept All Cookies](https://cleargene.com/<#>)[Reject all cookies](https://cleargene.com/<#>)
Manage Consent Preferences by Category
Essential
**Always Active**
These items are required to enable basic website functionality.
Marketing
Essential
These items are used to deliver advertising that is more relevant to you and your interests. They may also be used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. Advertising networks usually place them with the website operator’s permission.
Personalization
Essential
These items allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your user name, language, or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features. For example, a website may provide you with local weather reports or traffic news by storing data about your current location.
Analytics
Essential
These items help the website operator understand how its website performs, how visitors interact with the site, and whether there may be technical issues. This storage type usually doesn’t collect information that identifies a visitor.
[Confirm my preferences and close](https://cleargene.com/<#>)

generated_description:
**Clear Gene: Pioneering Cancer Diagnostics**

Clear Gene operates at the intersection of technology and healthcare, particularly focusing on cancer diagnostics. Founded in San Carlos, California, and part of Y Combinator’s S18 batch, the company is built on a small but dedicated team of four. Their mission is ambitious: to help eradicate cancer by enabling doctors to effectively identify residual disease—cancer that persists post-treatment.

### Innovative Diagnostic Solutions

Clear Gene harnesses the power of genomics and machine learning. The company is particularly focused on improving the detection of residual solid tumors, a field that has historically lagged behind advancements in liquid tumors. This is crucial because patients with solid tumors, such as breast cancer, often face significant hurdles in accurately assessing their condition post-treatment.

Additionally, Clear Gene has pivoted to address urgent needs during the pandemic through their MICA Software™, which enhances the efficiency of clinical labs. Their technology simplifies the processing of COVID-19 samples, allowing labs to do more with less while maintaining reliability.

### Products and Services

- **MICA Software™**: This advanced tool improves the interpretation of test results, enabling better decision-making in clinical settings.
- **MICA Test Kits**: Rapid and sensitive, these kits serve as cost-effective alternatives to traditional PCR tests.
- **MICA–Direct™ Kits**: These kits streamline RNA extraction processes, drastically reducing the time needed for testing from hours to just minutes.

### Culture and Support

Clear Gene prides itself on fostering a culture of innovation. They understand that groundbreaking advancements in science often emerge from unorthodox ideas, and they aim to balance innovative thinking with methodical execution. Supported by renowned organizations like Y Combinator and the NIH, Clear Gene’s approach is grounded in rigorous scientific inquiry.

### Conclusion

In a world where early detection can make all the difference in cancer treatment, Clear Gene stands out as a beacon of hope. Their commitment to improving diagnostic technologies could potentially change the landscape of oncology and save countless lives in the process. If you want to learn more about their mission and products, check out their website at [Clear Gene](https://cleargene.com).
